name: Options Chains Test
description: Test case for retrieving complete option chains through agent interaction

parts.text: Show me the complete options chain for Tesla (TSLA).

Here is the complete options chain for Tesla (TSLA):

**TSLA Options Chain:**

*

**Options Chain Overview:**
- **Expiration Dates:** Multiple expiration cycles available
- **Strike Prices:** Range from deeply in-the-money to far out-of-the-money
- **Call Options:** Right to buy TSLA at the strike price
- **Put Options:** Right to sell TSLA at the strike price
- **Greeks:** Delta, Gamma, Theta, Vega for risk analysis

This shows all available tradable options for TSLA across different expirations and strikes.
